item.description: I recently attended with another meetup group,this wonderful restaurant.....It is family-run with teriffic food and service....The family pays close attention to the customer and will gladly discuss anything on the menu to give you a better understanding on what each item is and guide you to your decision of ordering......It is a relaxed atmosphere and you feel just like at home being served by mom.....the hartford advocate just had a review....here is the link...http://www.ct.com/entertainment/restaurants/nm-ht11dining-20120308,0,7530986.story....a definite treat...
item.how_to_find_us: a warm welcome by chuck 860-729-4504 my email chuckles39@comcast.net

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: PERUVIAN CUISINE.......LA KERENCYA RESTAURANT SUNDAY APRIL 15 ...2PM
